title: Noemie's Journey
description: 2019 READERS' FAVORITE SILVER MEDAL.A man running from his past. A woman fighting for her future.In what world could the two of them ever connect? Not this one.Richard is certain small-town Summitville, North Carolina is a safe haven from his demons...until a woman with stunning green eyes resurrects the protective instinct that once cost him everything. And rattles the walls of his armored heart.Noï¿½mie knows her place in this prejudiced town, but Richard is temptation on two wheels. Despite their best intentions, attraction-and trouble-finds them both. Can love bloom where it's planted, or will hate rip out their love by the roots?
author: Victoria Saccenti
